title: Guided Buying Experience
description: Interactive product recommendation engine built at DataMap, guiding users through a curated buying journey with smart filtering and comparison tools.

title: RecyclePlatinum
description: E-commerce platform for precious metal recycling services, featuring a streamlined user experience for selling and tracking recycled materials.

title: Joshinator Analyzer
description: Data analysis tool that processes and visualizes complex datasets with an intuitive interface and powerful analytics capabilities.

title: RAgent
description: An intelligent AI agent leveraging retrieval-augmented generation for enhanced context-aware responses and task automation.

title: Letter Links
description: A word puzzle game that challenges players to connect letters and form words through an engaging, interactive interface.

title: Retro Rumble
description: A retro-style fighting game with pixel art graphics, combo systems, and multiplayer support inspired by classic arcade brawlers.

title: StyleU
description: A fashion-tech application that provides personalized style recommendations and outfit suggestions using AI-driven analysis.
